title: U.S. consumers who use marijuana 2019 , by age group
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Share of respondents, with a total of 4 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is  positive which exists from 30-49_years to 65+_years.
Similarly, the next significant trend is  negative which exists from 18-29_years to 30-49_years.
